Module nl.meron.yaeger
Package nl.meron.yaeger.engine.debug

Class Debugger

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.meron.yaeger.engine.debug.Debugger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatisticsObserver
    public class Debugger
extends Object
implements StatisticsObserver
    The Debugger is used to gather and show in game debug information.
